name: J. J. Keller New Employee Safety Kit
description: A ready-to-go OSHA compliance kit covering essential training, PPE, and documentation for general industry new hires.
target_audience_match: Perfect for busy HR teams trying to onboard hourly staff fast without skipping OSHA basics.

name: ClickSafety OSHA 10 Online Training Bundle
description: Fully digital OSHA 10 training with printable certificate, ideal for remote onboarding or tech-savvy workplaces.
target_audience_match: Ideal for remote teams or managers trying to meet OSHA training without bringing everyone onsite.

name: Seton OSHA Compliance Starter Pack
description: All-in-one physical toolkit for OSHA basics: signs, posters, logs, and a digital compliance guide.
target_audience_match: Great for first-time safety officers scrambling to meet OSHA posting and log requirements.

name: National Safety Compliance New Hire Video Kit
description: DVD + USB safety training kit covering OSHA basics, hazard communication, and first aid for new employees.
target_audience_match: Best for shops or field sites with poor Wi-Fi that still need compliant, trackable training.

name: 360training OSHA 10 & PPE Package
description: Digital OSHA 10 training with optional PPE add-on bundle â€” built for scalable onboarding in construction or warehouse roles.
target_audience_match: Perfect for overwhelmed site managers juggling compliance and gear needs across new hires.
